name: Unchained Soul
description:
The game covers the story of a father who promised his daughter that they would someday go to the forest at night to see fireflies, however, an accident would prevent this from happening anytime soon, so he fights through a dark place to reach her one more time to fulfill that last wish.

Uncover the memories of a father whose will is strong enough to overcome anything. Unleash powerful combos with different possible combinations!

You start as a soul and you must possess bodies to progress through the game by finishing puzzles or fighting enemies. There are many possible combos available by mixing the light attacks and strong attacks.

Controls

W, A, S, D keys to move (Soul and character).

Q, E keys to move up or down (Soul).

Left mouse click: Light Attack (Character).

Right mouse click: Strong Attack (Character).

Spacebar: Jump (Character).

Left Control: Dodge (Character).

Shif: Unpossess character.

Escape: Close game.
